Package it.unibo.ds.core.codes

Interface CodeGeneratorStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
HashGenerator, SecureRandomGenerator
public interface CodeGeneratorStrategy
An interface modeling a OneTimeCode generator strategy.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default OneTimeCode
    generateCode()
    Generates a new code, no matter if it has already been generated.
    default OneTimeCode
    generateCode(String arg)
    Generates a new code, no matter if it has already been generated.
    OneTimeCode
    generateCode(Predicate<OneTimeCode> alreadyGenerated)
    Generates a new, not already generated, code.
    OneTimeCode
    generateCode(Predicate<OneTimeCode> alreadyGenerated, String arg)
    Generates a new, not already generated, code.
    default OneTimeCode
    generateCode(Set<OneTimeCode> alreadyGenerated)
    Generates a new code different from those given in input.
    default OneTimeCode
    generateCode(Set<OneTimeCode> alreadyGenerated, String arg)
    Generates a new code different from those given in input.

  • Method Details

    • generateCode

      OneTimeCode generateCode(Predicate<OneTimeCode> alreadyGenerated)
      Generates a new, not already generated, code.
      Parameters:
      alreadyGenerated - a Predicate that returns true if the tested code was already generated, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      the new generated code.

    • generateCode

      OneTimeCode generateCode(Predicate<OneTimeCode> alreadyGenerated, String arg)
      Generates a new, not already generated, code.
      Parameters:
      alreadyGenerated - a Predicate that returns true if the tested code was already generated, false otherwise
      arg - a string argument to be used in the generation phase. Note this is implementation dependant!
      Returns:
      the new generated code.

    • generateCode

      default OneTimeCode generateCode(Set<OneTimeCode> alreadyGenerated)
      Generates a new code different from those given in input.
      Parameters:
      alreadyGenerated - a Set containing the already generated codes.
      Returns:
      a new generated code.

    • generateCode

      default OneTimeCode generateCode(Set<OneTimeCode> alreadyGenerated, String arg)
      Generates a new code different from those given in input.
      Parameters:
      alreadyGenerated - a Set containing the already generated codes.
      arg - a string argument to be used in the generation phase. Note this is implementation dependant!
      Returns:
      the new generated code.

    • generateCode

      default OneTimeCode generateCode()
      Generates a new code, no matter if it has already been generated.
      Returns:
      a new generated code.

    • generateCode

      default OneTimeCode generateCode(String arg)
      Generates a new code, no matter if it has already been generated.
      Parameters:
      arg - a string argument to be used in the generation phase. Note this is implementation dependant!
      Returns:
